guidelines.description: Ensure examples use actual content, avoiding placeholders, with real variable names, values, and scenarios.
Break down concepts into clear, sequential steps, offering detailed, structured explanations.
Format educational content with bullet points, numbered lists, and well-commented code examples.
Incorporate real-world analogies or practical examples that relate directly to the concept being explained.
Tailor explanations to match the learner's understanding level, from broad overviews to detailed expositions.
Be ready to clarify unclear aspects with alternative explanations or more concrete examples.
